Leonia School Update:
Good morning members of the Leonia community,
As you may know, on Wednesday the Governor revise his executive order allowing for 100% online digital distance learning for the upcoming school year as a method of instruction. As a result, several schools have revise their plans; some pushing back the start date of school, some going fully digital and some revising their hybrid plan.

The Leonia school district will be continuing with our hybrid in person learning for those who chose that method of instruction for their child. To avoid an every other day schedule, we added slight modification to our plan. Please Click on the link to read more. Notification will be sent out via E blast later today.

Link for Plan A with revisions:
https://4.files.edl.io/ca6a/08/14/20/153742-c2a86f04-11f9-4f62-a2d1-4fc320d04361.pdf

If you have any questions, please email:

Edward.bertolini@leoniaschools.org
Bryce.Robins@boe.leoniaschools.org

Best,

Bryce Robins
President

- Each room has been sprayed with disinfectant and surface areas have been wiped down.

In addition, our maintenance and administrative staffs have
-delivered nearly 200 meals on a daily basis to students in our Lunch Program
-processed over 300 computers to students in need of a computer or families needing more than one computer to participate in distance learning.

If you have any questions, please send me an email through this website.

Thank you again for your cooperation and support during this very difficult time period,

Ed Bertolini
Superintendent - Leonia Schools
